sentence: The venue has great surroundings and a good running route ask for a map at reception
The weather was sunny made the experience much more enjoyable with the roof skylight windows
It was truly a memorable experience which we can not thank Chateau Elan enough
Quality of meals in legends was exceptional and the bars have a comfortable sophisticated style
Vineyards a winery multiple golf courses a European Spa a 5 star hotel and the most picturesque setting for a restaurant on the east coast
The bedding was extremely comfortable and the bed was one of the best I have ever experienced away from home
If there was a word for Beyond excellent that would be one of the best ways to describe the experience
She made the experience pleasant for my wife and I
There are not many rooms in the Spa building and the atmosphere is relaxed peaceful and warm
The buy next to her was handling the couple next to us very well and was very well spoken and hospitable not sure why our experience was bad

I get the sense from the hotel that they could care less if you ever come back and I guess they really do not want you to because they do not go to much effort to make your experience better than average
For the pricing of the rooms a cleaner experience is expected
I was very disappointed with my recent experience to the Chateau
Overall we were pleased with the experience of Chateau but wish we would have paid a little extra for a better room with a view and more privacy
I do not like to give bad reviews but I will now be searching for another experience outside of making the drive to Braselton
Although they told us about renovations it was a disorganized frustrating poor experience
Something that you do not feel like you are being charged for every little experience
We went on a weekday special and got a 200 resort credit and it still seemed a little pricy for the experience
We feel shortchanged as we will not get to experience
Fast forward to the present the experience is dry as the chicken and sparse is not the word but barren of good thoughtfully prepared selections is not far off
